name: Simple 2000 Series Ultimate Vol. 22: Stylish Mahjong
summary: Stylish Mahjong Usagi is a mahjong game that features different modes, the most special is the story mode one in which the player at the beginning of the game takes the role of a young high school student called Takeda (the player can unlock other characters playing the game) and will advance through the game winning mahjong matches.
